test result takes 3 days in many cases  so if in ward 5 peoppe are positive and 45 negative  they will become positive and come out   we lost our beloved freedom fighter grandfather at sason hospital pune  he was tested negative  but he passed away before the results came   our freedom fighter grandfather was admitted at sason hospital for corona testing ward    we ourselves lifted him and put him moving his hands  they should have done something so atleast oxygen was given to him untill test result came   there protocal is before corona test result no medicice will be given  this we felt is not right   we feel people who are very serious should be given proper medicinal attention till the test results come   other wise deaths from non corona patients will be more   some of the the hospital   they sent the nurse to the hospital with no warnings   the case was reported again with two other employees   an inspection by the mumbai municipal corporation later confirmed that four employees had been diagnosed with the disease   the hospital was then sealed   five employees who were diagnosed with the disease were transferred to seven hills hospital   breech candy officials  however  refused to provide medical information to seven hills    then faced many difficulties   on april 21  the four employees returned to breach candy hospital for treatment   one of the test results was later confirmed as positive   the nurse  despite being under suspicious circumstances  was compelled to interact with other staff members   the employee was shifted to the hospital at the suggestion of mumbai corporation at one o clock in the morning   but the ill health and selfish interests of the hospital authorities  who are trying to make a profit by risking even the lives of their employees  are very grave   the lives of many malayalee nurse siblings will be at risk if the government does not take action on a wartime basis   their problems need to be solved not just by
